title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Yuumei
raw_text: Cover Art  Ashes    Wenqing Yan, aka Yuumei, is a Chinese born artist living in California. She uses inspirations from nature, her dreams, and personal experiences to create her art. They range from the magical dreamscapes to real world cityscapes, reflecting dynamic emotions from the whimsical to introspective.
text:
Cover Art
Ashes
Wenqing Yan, aka Yuumei, is a Chinese born artist living in California. She uses inspirations from nature, her dreams, and personal experiences to create her art. They range from the magical dreamscapes to real world cityscapes, reflecting dynamic emotions from the whimsical to introspective.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Ashes by Yuumei
